name: World War 2 (Prototype)
description:
Pretty cool fps game, buts it's literally 1 level. This is a prototype, and may have glitches. Please try it out!

(Please donate so I can put more money into my games!)

Controls:

  • WASD to move.
  • Hold C to crouch.
  • Enter to open doors.
  • 1-10 to select weapons. (You start with only one!)
  • Left click to shoot, Right click to aim/zoom.
  • (Am I forgetting anything?)
